title: Ghosts of Cape Sabine: The Harrowing True Story of the Greely Expedition
description: The ill-fated 1881 effort to establish an American fort in the Arctic is chronicled in full detail, covering the terrible saga of starvation, mutiny, suicide, shipwreck, execution, and cannibalism that destroyed nineteen of the original twenty-five explorers. Reprint.
author: Leonard F. Guttridge
